title: Simple Calendar Compatibility Bridge
description: Provides 100% Simple Calendar API compatibility with complete separation of concerns. Bridges modern calendar modules (Seasons & Stars) to Simple Calendar-dependent modules (Simple Weather, SmallTime). Handles all format conversions, CSS/DOM compatibility, and hook translations automatically.

recommends.reason: Primary calendar provider for compatibility bridging

conflicts.reason: Provides the same API - use either this bridge or Simple Calendar, not both
